articles.title: GOP backs away from some hard-line abortion measures it once championed - The Washington Post
articles.description: It's the latest indication that many Americans are balking at extreme restrictions being imposed.
articles.content: An aggressive push by Republicans to pass hard-line antiabortion measures is faltering in some state legislatures and on Capitol Hill, the latest indication that many Americans are balking at extreme… [+9150 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: In Louisiana, the first US climate refugees find a new safe haven - ABC News
articles.description: Native Americans forced from their homes as the island they were built on gradually sinks into the Gulf of Mexico are now settling into new homes thanks to a federal resettlement grant.
articles.content:
Joann Bourg stands in front of her new home, about an hour's drive from the low-lying Louisiana island where she grew up  an area gradually sinking into the Gulf of Mexico.

articles.title: Garth Brooks thrills fans at long-awaited Dublin concert - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The 60-year-old American is due to play five concerts at Croke Park over the course of nine days.
